hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.name: Jonathan Espinosa Garcia
hero.description: Computer Systems Engineer with 1 year of experience building web applications. I work with a modern tech stack that includes Angular, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, and I also have experience building websites with WordPress. My focus is on creating complete, scalable systems with an emphasis on UX/UI, responsive design, and clean code best practices.

projectList.title: Vehicle Fleet Management System for CFE
projectList.shortDescription: Development of an integrated platform to manage the CFE's vehicle fleet, enabling visualization of vehicle statuses, reporting faults, coordinating repairs with mechanical workshops, and maintaining a fully documented service history.
projectList.fullDescription: I developed a comprehensive vehicle fleet management system for the Federal Electricity Commission (CFE) to centralize all information related to vehicles across different departments. Area supervisors could view tables showing each vehicle’s status (operational, in workshop, or broken), along with key details such as license plates, model, year, vehicle type, and the assigned driver or responsible person. When a vehicle malfunctioned, coordinators created detailed reports with descriptions and photos, which mechanical workshops reviewed to propose diagnostics, estimated repair times, and a preliminary budget. Once approved, the vehicle was assigned to a workshop, where technicians documented each step through a timeline with images and progress updates. The platform also generated delivery receipts once the vehicle was fully repaired and validated by CFE. All initial vehicle information was imported via CSV files, and every repair record was stored in organized folders to maintain a complete historical archive of each vehicle.

projectList.title: Backend System for Busher COCDRIL'S Franchise
projectList.shortDescription: Development of a backend system using Node.js, Express and MongoDB to manage employees, menus, branches and orders, including JWT authentication and daily PDF reports.
projectList.fullDescription: I implemented a complete backend for the Busher COCDRIL'S franchise (June–July 2024) using Node.js, Express and MongoDB. The system managed employee data (name, role, address, salary), menu configuration (products, ingredients, combos, prices and extras) and branch information. The orders module allowed waiters to add products by IDs, custom notes (e.g., “no mayo”), extra ingredients with unit costs and quantities; the system automatically calculated subtotal, tax (IVA) and total. Finally, I built the daily closing feature that generates a PDF report containing all orders of the day, service type (takeaway / dine-in), waiter name and a sales summary.

projectList.title: Electric Bike Online Store
projectList.shortDescription: Development of an online store using WordPress, focused on UX/UI, visual customization, responsive optimization, and component adjustments for a modern user experience.
projectList.fullDescription: I built a complete electric bike store using WordPress (September 2024). I handled the UI customization, including color palette, typography, and visual components to match the brand identity. I enhanced the site's UX/UI for smoother navigation and optimized it for a fully responsive design across different screen sizes. I also customized native WordPress components to deliver a more professional and cohesive experience.

projectList.title: DREFITNESS Online Store
projectList.shortDescription: Development of an online store for gym equipment using WordPress, focused on UX/UI, accessibility, visual design, and responsive layout.
projectList.fullDescription: I developed a full online store for gym equipment using WordPress (September–October 2024). I focused on delivering a refined user experience, strong accessibility, a clean and functional layout, and customized buttons, colors, and typography. I also implemented a fully responsive design and added custom CSS to fine-tune components and improve the overall visual consistency of the site.

projectList.title: Graduate Thesis Tracking System — Instituto Tecnológico de Cuautla
projectList.shortDescription: Development of a full academic management system for monitoring graduate thesis progress, handling periods, assignments, advising, grading, and administrative control.
projectList.fullDescription: I developed a comprehensive thesis management system for graduate students at the Instituto Tecnológico de Cuautla (October 2024 – February 2025). The platform allowed the coordinator to register faculty accounts, manage academic periods, and create student accounts through CSV bulk import. Professors could assign tasks (such as reviewing thesis chapters), set deadlines, and link their advisees so assignments were sent automatically. Graduate students had a dedicated module where they could view their assignments, submit work via Drive links, access feedback, and review graded or returned tasks. The system also managed all core thesis information, including title, status, and the requirement to upload their published academic article. Each user type —coordinator, professor, and student— had a personalized dashboard: the coordinator accessed global system stats; professors saw only their advisees; and students managed all information related to their thesis. All users had a full profile module where they could edit personal data and update their password. Once a thesis was approved by the professor, the coordinator used an administrative panel to validate the work or return it for revision. The system included JWT authentication, Bcrypt encryption, a backend developed with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, and a professional interface built with Angular.

about.title: About me
about.short: I'm a Frontend Developer with a Fullstack profile, specialized in modern user interfaces and complete web systems. I work with Angular, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, handling both UI and backend logic. I have experience with authentication, REST APIs, data encryption, and access control. I am looking for a team where I can grow professionally and add real value.
about.long:
I'm a Frontend Developer with a Fullstack profile, focused on building modern, accessible, and optimized interfaces. I have participated in academic, commercial, and institutional projects using Angular, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, developing both frontend and complete APIs.

I am currently looking to join a team where I can continue growing and contribute real value.
